name: Super Mario Kart: Alternate Tracks 2
overview: A new set of complete replacement tracks for Super Mario Kart. The intent is to maintain the same feel as the original with a fresh set of races. A collection of Super Mario characters, including Mario, Luigi, Yoshi, Peach, Bowser and Donkey Kong Jr., are out to win the Super Mario Kart championship. Collect coins to boost your speed while using shells and bananas to stop others on the track.
